short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smileys that pop-up gradually as you type in the new tab search box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you open a new tab, random smiley faces will appear on the screen for as long as you type, giving you entertainment for hours.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to installing the "Smiley Pop Search" extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing.

Terms and Conditions: https://www.addontechgroup.com/smiley-pop-search/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.addontechgroup.com/smiley-pop-search/privacy-policy
Contact: https://www.addontechgroup.com/contact
